questions.question: What is the dominant color of the main body of the product?

What is the overall shape or form of the item when rolled?
What brand name is prominently displayed on the product?
Describe the texture of the visible fabric surface.
What is the apparent method of product packaging or containment?

What is the apparent condition of the fabric (e.g., new, worn)?
Is the product's surface glossy or matte?

Considering the fabric and fastening, what is the likely material of the straps?
